data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Burgos, Castilla y León, Spain.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Burgos, Castilla y León, Spain

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Burgos to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Burgos, Castilla y León, Spain to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Burgos, Castilla y León, Spain with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Tunisian people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Tunisian people.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Burgos.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Burgos, Castilla y León, Spain a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary:
the county of Burgos, Castilla y León, Spain has a population of 375,600.

We estimate Burgos has 6,014 people who might know Jesus, 284,361 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 85,225 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Burgos.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
